content:
Action:4

I choose to move up, aiming to close the vertical gap between my position and the exit, and I expect to see my avatar successfully advance to row 6.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,1) to (6,2) to incrementally head toward the exit in the upper right, while avoiding walls and hazards.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,2) to (6,3) to head toward the gap at column 6, which gives me a chance to go upward later toward the exit at (1,11). I'll verify that my position changes and adjust if I only rotated.

Action:2

I'm pushing right from (6,3) into the box at (6,4) so it bounces into (6,5), moving me one step closer to reaching a column (≥6) that lets me safely go up toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,4) to push the box at (6,5) out of the way, expecting it to bounce forward into (6,6) and clear a route so I can then move upward along column 6 toward the exit.

Action:2

I'm choosing to move right from (6,5) to push the box at (6,6) into the free floor at (6,7), which should clear the way for me to eventually head upward toward the exit.

Action:4

I'm moving up from the current position at (6,6) to the free floor at (5,6), progressing toward an eventual path to the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I’m choosing to move RIGHT in order to push the box at (5,7) out of the way, expecting that this will clear a path upward and bring me closer to the exit at (1,11).

Action:4

I'm moving upward to position (4,7), which is a safe floor tile, aiming to start advancing toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving the avatar to the right from (4,7) to (4,8), which is a safe floor tile, aiming to gradually head toward the exit at (1,11) while avoiding the boxes and hazards.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (4,8) to (4,7) into an open floor spot, which should reposition the avatar for a clearer route toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving right to position (4,8) on a free floor, expecting this step to set up a safer route toward the exit at (1,11) while avoiding direct box collisions.

Action:4  
I'm pushing upward from (4,8) to bump the box at (3,8) so it bounces into (2,8), expecting to clear a path upward toward the exit at (1,11).

``` Action:4 ```
I'm moving UP to push the box at (row2, col8) and clear a path upward toward the exit at (row1, col11), expecting to advance closer to the goal while leveraging the box's bounce effect.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (2,8) to push the box at (2,9) out of the way and head toward the exit at (1,11), aligning with the planned route.

Action:4

I'm moving UP, expecting the avatar to advance from (2,9) to (1,9) so that I can then maneuver toward the exit at (1,11) in subsequent moves.

Action:2

I'm moving right to bring the avatar closer to the exit door, expecting the next move to complete the path to victory.

Action:2

I'm moving right towards the exit since it's adjacent to my current position, expecting to trigger the win condition by reaching the door.
